SELECT p.id, p.name as perfume_name, brand_info.name as brand_name, p.description, p.gender_id as gender, country_info.country, p.year, rating_info.rating_val, rating_info.rating_count
FROM perfumes as p
JOIN brand_info ON p.brand_id = brand_info.id JOIN rating_info ON p.rating_id = rating_info.id JOIN country_info ON p.country_id = country_info.id
WHERE p.id = #{id} ;

SELECT li.length, pl.vote_num
FROM perfumes as p
JOIN perfume_longevity as pl ON p.id = pl.perfume_id JOIN longevity_info as li ON pl.longevity_info_id = li.id
WHERE p.id = #{id} ;

SELECT a.name, pma.weight
FROM perfumes as p
JOIN perfume_main_accords as pma ON p.id = pma.perfume_id JOIN accords as a ON pma.accord_id = a.id
WHERE p.id = #{id} ;

SELECT ps.season, ps.weight
FROM perfumes as p
JOIN perfume_season as ps ON p.id = ps.perfume_id
WHERE p.id = #{id} ;

SELECT n.type, n.name
FROM perfumes as p
JOIN perfume_notes as pn ON p.id = pn.perfume_id JOIN notes as n ON pn.note_id = n.id
WHERE p.id = #{id} ;

SELECT pdn.day_night, pdn.weight
FROM perfumes as p
JOIN perfume_day_night as pdn ON p.id = pdn.perfume_id
WHERE p.id = #{id} ;

SELECT ci.comment
FROM perfumes as p
JOIN perfume_comment as pc ON p.id = pc.perfume_id JOIN comments_info as ci ON pc.comment_id = ci.id
WHERE p.id = #{id} ;

SELECT c.id as category_id, c.description as category_description, m.id as mood_id, m.description as mood_description FROM mood as m
JOIN category_mood as cm ON m.id = cm.mood_id JOIN category as c ON cm.category_id = c.id ;
SELECT n.name, n.korean_name, n.type, dn.percentage as weight FROM perfumes as p JOIN determined_notes as dn ON p.id = perfume_id JOIN notes as n ON dn.note_id = n.id WHERE p.id = #{perfumeId} ;
